page.title: 16MRS SMITH OF SOMERSALL
page.content:
Mrs Smith lives on the{Somersall} estate. She is a{housewife and supply {teacher.}Her normal day starts at 7:15am.{Breakfast}for the family is between 7:30-8:00 and consists of cereals, bacon and eggs or grapefruit.
If she is working Mrs Smith leaves home about 8:00. The eldest of her two children leaves on the school bus at 8:40. Mrs Smith has her{lunch}at 12:30. If she is not teaching she sometimes spends her afternoons shopping in Chesterfield.
Mrs Smith's family arrive home about 4:10. The family{evening}meal is between 4:30-5:30. In the evening Mrs Smith attends an evening class on{Yoga once a week.
